description:
Muhammad Ali, nicknamed 'The Greatest' is regarded as one of the most significant sports figures of the 20th century, and is frequently ranked as the greatest heavyweight boxer of all time. In 1999, he was named Sportsman of the Century by Sports Illustrated and the Sports Personality of the Century by the BBC.

This dataset has been gathered from the following URL and collected using the Python language libraries like Pandas and NumPy.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boxing_career_of_Muhammad_Ali

The insights from this dataset are:
Muhammad Ali fought 162 bouts in his career. Out of them, he won 56 bouts, lost 8 bouts and there was No Result in 98 bouts.
title: Muhammad Ali Boxing Career
